extendedInfo.description: Handy Safe Pro - a new level of usability comes to data management applications with unbeatable security functionality. Customized graphical cards represent all your confidential information in an easy-to-use interface, and 448-bit Blowfish encryption guarantees absolute security. Keep your mind free of countless numbers and letters. Your important information is now in one place - safe, easy to access, and always with you. Please visit http://www.handy-safe.com for more informaton.âI know it can be frightening and a little unnerving to carry around all of your important information, but I do feel that Handy Safe Pro has made me feel better about it.â - Android Gals, 08/2011http://androidgals.com/2011/08/28/data-management-made-easy-with-handy-safe-pro/Handy Safe FEATURES:â¢ New graphical card representation.â¢ Set of 65+ preinstalled graphical templates and icons.â¢ Card customization.â¢ NEW! Sync with desktop client to ensure database integrity. Now for $9.99! (you need to download Handy Safe Desktop Professional from www.handy-safe.com).â¢ Strong 448-bit Blowfish data encryption guarantees absolute safety of your confidential information. There is no effective code breaking method currently known.â¢ 35 unique information forms to store passwords, credit card details, codes, accounts (banking, email, Internet, shopping), web pages, addresses, travel info, insurance policies, software keys and much more.â¢ Custom templates to store specific information according to your needs.â¢ URLs are treated as hyperlinks.â¢ Subfolder support.â¢ Autolock when Handy Safe Pro is in background or not used for a certain period of time.---------About Paragon Paragon Software Group is the leading developer of multi-platform software applications for smartphones and desktop computers. Since its inception in 1994, the company has strived to exceed the expectations of its global customers by translating its innovative approach, expertise and independent production capacities to all levels of its diversified product development. Our product portfolio includes over 120 Multilingual Dictionaries (for 30+ languages and all possible language pair combinations) with databases by the worldâs leading publishing houses such as Merriam-Webster, Collins, Duden, PONS, Van Dale, VOX, etc. For more information visit http://www.slovoed.com/tags: handy, safe, pro, desktop, paragon, software, security, tools, wallet, password, keeper, pin, code, id

reviews.title: Poor reliability due to lost data.
reviews.comment: Good mosf of the time, BUT.... Sometimes it will not open and locks my Galaxy note with a blank screen. Nothing to do but force turn off, even remove battery to reactivate phone, problem is that when this happens all the latest data is lost, So.. Not very reliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK, but..
reviews.comment: Please get rid of the utterly unnecessary calls to media mounted, media ejecting, media removed and bad media removal.. It messes up Samsung devices that aren\'t rooted! You\'ll make a lot of people happier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes most of the time
reviews.comment: What can I say, crashes all the time. Add Sync to cloud feature would be great.
reviews.author: G Pratomo

reviews.title: Screwed synchronise
reviews.comment: Used it for years on Nokia as well.  However, it just screwed me by losing ALL the changes I did on my Note, when I synced with the PC.  Also, regularly crashing and showing blank screen.  Time to look for an alternative, unless they improve on the reliability.
reviews.author: Mike King

reviews.title: Flanimal
reviews.comment: Poo because the PC sync isn\'t compatible with my Samsung Galaxy Nexus.  Crashes if left open.  Doesn\'t save to dropbox. Fix these and Ill give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, supports many platforms
reviews.comment: I started to use this app before many years on the Nokia N95 (Symbian with keyboard only), then I switched to the Samsung Omnia HD (Symbian with touchscreen only), this app was compatible and I could use all my password data without any problem. Later I switched to Samsung Galaxy S2 (Android with multitouch), data could be copied again, super! Now I have the Samsung Galaxy S3 (Android with multitouch) and I\'m still happy with it. They offer also a Windows prog which can sync pwd data. Nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great cross-platform app, BUT
reviews.comment: If you install it on a Galaxy TAB 10.1 it will prevent you from connecting it to Kies (prevents the usb service app on theTAB to start). Force close or uninstall will fix it. Bob
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Security flaw - look anywhere else!
reviews.comment: 1. This application has a major security flaw: After closing the application (manually or period of inactivity self-closing) the last viewed card can be still perfectly seen in recent applications window.  2. Jelly bean running devices will not sync with the desktop application - Checked on HTC One S and Google Nexus 7. Customer support is useless - they ignore the problem altogether.
reviews.author: Pesho Peshov

reviews.title: Crashes in background
reviews.comment: Long time user from.Nokia and Sony phones, reliable sync with desktop, incredibly useful. But app crashes if left open when you return to it (tested on Samsung and HTC) still despite reporting to dev. For 1year+. No apparent development and very poor app support. Will remove it as soon as I can transfer my data out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Glad this app is now available for Android as I have been using it on Symbian for years. Works seamless with all my devices. Great app to have and cheap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add suggestion
reviews.comment: Please add option for online data synchronisation due to boring wire connection of Mass Storage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Pretty good app with excellent desktop sync software (unfortunately sold separately) with few imperfections
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Setting for font size
reviews.comment: I installed this app in Samsung Tab 7.7. I hate the info view is so bloody small & i cannot adjust it !!!!! WTF !!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App but...
reviews.comment: The app on iOS and WP  devices the sync with desktop works great. Too bad it not works with Android JB (4.2..). Hope it will be fixed soon and then it will be the best app.
reviews.author: Patrizius Schwarzbach

reviews.title: Highly disappointed
reviews.comment: I bought the app for my SG note II, iphone 4 and my windows laptop. Lost all entries on SG note II when connected to my laptop for the fist time. It took over 7 hours to store my data on the note II. Complaint sent to developer has been ignored. It\'s a shame.
reviews.author: Ola Papa Onigbanjo

reviews.title: A year since the last update?
reviews.comment: I now have several Nexus and there is no way to sync to iMac. Contacted Support and at first received a useless answer (in Russian!) to contact E-care. A 2nd email gave me info on where to copy my current database files on the Nexus.   After a lot of hassle learning how to copy the files via Dropbox to the Nexus folder, I eventually managed OK :)  GS2: I would give a 4 star but for the USB syncing. On iPhones syncing HS Pro via OTA is simple.   On the GS2 I struggle with USB. The instructions are wrong, it is impossible to eject the SD cards safely when I finally manage to sync!      Please introduce OTA syncing ASAP... or at least update the instructions!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buyer Beware of Using PC Version!!
reviews.comment: I have used Handy Safe Pro on several phones over the past five years. The android version works wonderfully by itself. When you try to sync it with the PC it freezes and leaves the information unavailable and unsaved. I haven\'t been able to sync it with my phone in over six months and, shame on me, I didn\'t switch to a different program. When hurricane Sandy struck the East Coast my computer fried and died. Since I was keeping my latest information on my PC, I lost it all. Also, tech support was absolutely no help at all. Fix these problems and I\'m sure the program would be a five-star wonder.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Have been using this app for a while. upgraded to Android 2.3.5 a few days ago from which time I have been unable to open handy safe.It does not recognize the password. I have emailed the developers twice for help but there has been no response. I am very surprised and disappointed at the lack of response. Without adequate backup any app is worse than useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app! Defo worth buying
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a few apps to keep my personal data safe and this one is the best i\'ve come across.. Its simple to use and add info plus the encryption is the best out there info is safe from prying eyes with this....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good until complete data loss
reviews.comment: Good app until I synchronised my pc with my mobile and then disaster as I lost all my data on the mobile. So all my new data has disappeared! Support took 14 days by email and was not helpful. Very disappointed!!
reviews.author: Gurmeet Mudan
